name: Scram Kitty and his Buddy on Rails
name_original: Scram Kitty and his Buddy on Rails
description:
Take control of Buddy, a rail-riding, laser-shooting young hero on a perilous quest to rescue his pet cat, Scram Kitty!

With a unique control system that allows for full 360 degree platforming action and thrilling 2D shooting, Scram Kitty and his Buddy on Rails will see you glide along glowing rails, leap across chasms and create arcing streams of shots as you rid each stage of its rodent aggressors and rescue all the cats imprisoned within.

With frenetic gameplay viewed from above and a striking blend of 2D and 3D graphics, Scram Kitty and his Buddy on Rails is a shoot-em-up platform game with a character all of its own.

  • Battle through multi-objective stages
  • Use distinctive weapons for ultimate destruction
  • Defeat thousands of miserable mice minions
  • Arcade Mode: play on just one credit, for the truly dedicated
  • Experience gorgeous pixel graphics mixed into 3D worlds
  • Bathe in a blistering original electro-synth soundtrack
